2017-09-05.name: Inagawa Junji no Sugooku Kowai Hanashi
2017-09-05.desc: * Based on a ghost stories book by Inagawa Junji.

2017-09-06.name: Jingisukan no Jin-kun
2017-09-06.desc:
Youji, Kei, Kelly, and the little bear-shaped robot Oscar are small heroes who must save the town. Today is Youji's birthday, but this doesn't seem to excite him. Whether or not they know this, Kei, Kelly, and the woman who raised him as her own, Anna, seem to be planning something. And that's when it appears over the city – an out-of-control sightseeing airship!

Our little heroes must face their biggest challenge yet! The action-packed drama even includes an evolved Fastening Machine! Will our heroes be able to fasten the town's future? What will become of Youji's birthday? There's only one way to find out!

Source: Official page

2017-09-10.name: Pocket Monsters Sun & Moon Planetarium
2017-09-10.desc:
Tomorrow is a very rare day, the day of a total solar eclipse. If we miss this chance, there won't be another eclipse visible in Alola for over 300 years. Hearing of this eclipse, Satoshi and his pals, along with Maamane, head to Eclipse Island which is in the center of the eclipse's path! There, they meet Fred, an "Eclipse Hunter" who travels the world to see eclipses, and they decide to watch the eclipse together with him. However, when the day arrives, the sky is filled with clouds... Satoshi and his pals realize that they'll be able to watch the eclipse for sure if they're above the clouds, so they head to the summit of a mountain. Meanwhile, the Rocket-dan trio has also sneaked out of Kiteguruma's den to catch a rare Pokémon said to appear during eclipses. They decide to try and catch Pikachu as well and block the way of Satoshi and his pals as they try to hurry to the summit! While everyone is busy, the eclipse has already started! Will Satoshi and his pals be able to watch the eclipse?!

With your Full-Force, don't miss it! The "Moment of Wonder" performed by the Sun and Moon!

Source: Bulbapedia

Note: This anime was first screened in the planetarium in Yamaguchi General Children's Center and later in other planetariums across Japan.

2017-09-14.name: Turning Mecard R
2017-09-14.desc:
* Based on shoujo manga series written and illustrated by the manga group Clamp.

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the 3rd manga volume. The OVA received an advance screening at the Anime Expo 2017 convention on July 1 in Los Angeles.

2017-09-15.name: Quanzhi Fashi 2
2017-09-15.desc:
Based off of the original Weekly Shonen Jump manga series from Haruichi Furudate, Haikyu!! is a slice-of-life sports anime revolving around Shoyo Hinata’s love of volleyball. Inspired by a small-statured pro volleyball player, Hinata creates a volleyball team in his last year of middle school. Unfortunately the team is matched up against the "King of the Court" Tobio Kageyama’s team in their first tournament and inevitably lose. After the crushing defeat, Hinata vows to surpass Kageyama After entering high school, Hinata joins the volleyball team only to find that Tobio has also joined.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-09-19.name: Di Ling Qu
2017-09-19.desc:
Ten years ago, the major earth-shaking “First Summer of Love” event occurred. Renton, who lost his father during the event, now attends the army school of the United Federation of Predgio Towers located in the border town of Bellforest. Because his late father is still praised, Renton feels something is lacking as he continues with his ordinary, boring days. Then one day, Nirvash, the world's oldest LFO, appears in front of him and a girl named Eureka emerges from the cockpit. This was the beginning of the future of humans and Scub Coral, another intelligent lifeform.

Source: ANN

2017-09-26.name: Blade Runner: Black Out 2022
2017-09-26.desc:
In 2022, an EMP detonation has caused a global blackout that has massive, destructive implications all over the world.

Source: crunchyroll

Note: An animated short which serves as a prologue for the upcoming feature film Blade Runner 2049.

2017-09-28.name: Shao Nian Jin Yi Wei Di Er Ji
2017-09-28.desc:
Emi is a seventeen-year-old girl living the high life in Shibuya. Her father is always away with work and she's grown listless. Suddenly, a twist of fate involving a certain magical item changes everything. A mysterious pencil, of all things, is linked to the appearance of heroes from another world! Could this be the start to the excitement she's so desperately craving, or is there something more?

Source: viz media
